bibl.title: Building and Examining Linguistic Phenomena in a Corpus of Representative Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Corpus linguistics as tool for papyrological studies. - 3. Corpus building, annotation, and analysis. - 4. Corpus compilation and papyrological studies. - 5. Register analysis and sociolinguistic reconstruction. - 6. Letter structure. - 7. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: PORTER Stanley E. and M.B. O'DONNELL, Building and Examining Linguistic Phenomena in a Corpus of Representative Papyri.
Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 287-311, 7 tabl.

1. Introduction. - 2. Corpus linguistics as tool for papyrological studies. - 3. Corpus building, annotation, and analysis. - 4. Corpus compilation and papyrological studies. - 5. Register analysis and sociolinguistic reconstruction. - 6. Letter structure. - 7. Conclusion.
